hypothesis_content.title: Low Gas Regime Signals Accumulation Phase for ETH
hypothesis_content.statement: When ETH gas fees remain below 30 gwei for 5+ consecutive days during a NEUTRAL/BULL regime, ETH price experiences a 7-12% upward move within the next 10 trading days as accumulation occurs.
hypothesis_content.rationale: Sustained low gas fees indicate reduced network congestion and lower transaction costs, making ETH more attractive for both users and investors. This often precedes increased on-chain activity and price appreciation.
entry_conditions: ETH gas (daily) < 30 gwei for 5 consecutive days
Volume profile shows increasing accumulation patterns
hypothesis_content.falsification_criteria: Extended periods (<30 gwei for 5+ days) fail to predict ETH price appreciation in 8 out of 10 instances, or consistently lead to price declines.
